comments.author: Roland Weber
comments.body:
I've checked in a fully untested ProxySelectorRoutePlanner.
I'm leaving this issue open until I've had time to make some tests.
Full unit testing will require a MockProxySelector.

cheers,
  Roland

comments.author: Roland Weber
comments.body: I have not really _tried_ it, but I added unit tests with a basic coverage of 70%.

description: Since we now require Java 5, we should have a route planner that uses the standard Java ProxySelector. That would allow us to automatically pick up proxy settings from system properties or the browser running an applet.
